boss.description: The voice and will of the Fey King

boss.description: A manifestation of the fire giant king

boss.description: The legendary king of frost giants

boss.description: A piece of the primordial giant from whom the world was made

boss.name: Echo of Atlas
boss.description: The burden-bearer, holding the weight of the world

boss.description: A deadly marksman who never misses

boss.description: A mysterious assassin employed by the bandits

boss.description: A hulking enforcer who keeps order through fear

boss.description: A twisted healer spreading disease instead of curing it

boss.description: The brutal leader of the orc horde

boss.description: An orc shaman channeling primal elemental fury

boss.description: Arena champion who has never lost a duel

boss.description: A mage who learned to harness the void

boss.description: Commands all elements simultaneously

boss.description: A mage who studied the void too deeply

boss.description: A knight corrupted by blood magic

boss.description: King of the ice giants

boss.description: The oldest spirit of the primordial forest

mythic.name: The Nameless One
mythic.description: An entity of pure chaos, constantly shifting between forms. Its very presence distorts reality.

mythic.name: Outer Titan
mythic.description: A cosmic being from beyond known space

mythic.name: Void Leviathan
mythic.description: A serpent of incomprehensible size from the void

mythic.name: Cosmic Horror
mythic.description: An entity whose true form drives mortals to madness

mythic.name: Astral Colossus
mythic.description: A titan from the astral plane

mythic.name: The King in Yellow
mythic.description: An unknowable entity from beyond reality

mythic.name: Azathoth the Star Eater
mythic.description: The blind idiot god who dreams reality itself

mythic.name: Nyarlathotep the Void God
mythic.description: The crawling chaos, messenger of the outer gods

mythic.name: Oceanus the Titan
mythic.description: The titan personification of the world ocean

mythic.name: Aspect of Cthulhu
mythic.description: A fragment of the dreaming god beneath the waves

mythic.name: Avatar of Dagon
mythic.description: The fish-god made manifest

mythic.name: Eternal Phoenix
mythic.description: An immortal firebird that cannot truly die

mythic.name: Fallen God
mythic.description: A deity cast down from the heavens

mythic.name: Eclipsed Seraph
mythic.description: An angel consumed by darkness during a cosmic eclipse

mythic.name: Shadow Dragon
mythic.description: A dragon born from the void itself

mythic.name: World Serpent
mythic.description: A serpent so large it encircles the world

mythic.name: Primordial Dragon
mythic.description: The first dragon, from which all others descended

mythic.name: Primordial Elemental
mythic.description: The first and most powerful of all elementals

mythic.name: Ancient Leshy
mythic.description: The oldest guardian spirit of the primordial forest

mythic.name: The First Fey
mythic.description: The original spark of fey magic given form

mythic.name: Grand Pixie Queen
mythic.description: The matriarch of all pixie-kind, ancient beyond measure

mythic.name: Primordial Titan
mythic.description: One of the original titans who ruled before the gods

mythic.name: Shadow of Kronos
mythic.description: A dark reflection of the titan of time

mythic.name: Utgard-Loki
mythic.description: The greatest of giant illusionists and tricksters

mythic.name: The First Jotun
mythic.description: The ancestral father of all giant-kind

mythic.name: Aspect of Lolth
mythic.description: A manifestation of the demon queen of spiders

mythic.name: The Progenitor Insect
mythic.description: The first insect from which all arthropods descended

mythic.name: Khepri Reborn
mythic.description: The scarab god who rolls the sun across the sky

mythic.name: Hive Singularity
mythic.description: The ultimate evolution of collective consciousness

mythic.name: Fenrir Unleashed
mythic.description: The great wolf freed from his chains, bringer of Ragnarok

mythic.name: Luna Incarnate
mythic.description: The moon itself given flesh and fury

mythic.name: The First Shifter
mythic.description: The original being to walk between human and beast

mythic.name: Primordial Ooze
mythic.description: The first living thing, the original cell from which all life emerged

mythic.name: Universal Solvent
mythic.description: An ooze that can dissolve anything, even concepts and ideas

mythic.name: Aspect of Yggdrasil
mythic.description: A fragment of the world tree's consciousness

mythic.name: Gaea's Bloom
mythic.description: The flower that births worlds
